title: Spider Baby or, The Maddest Story Ever Told

sources.title: Spider Baby (1967)
sources.description: A caretaker devotes himself to three demented siblings after their father's death. But then money-hungry relatives show up to usurp their inheritance.  Preserved by the Academy Film Archive in 2013. Watch on RetroFlix:

sources.title: Spider Baby: or, the Maddest Story Ever Told (1967)
sources.description: "Spider Baby: or, the Maddest Story Ever Told" is a 1967 American comedy horror film directed by Jack Hill.  Spider Baby follows the story of the Merrye family, who suffer from a genetic condition known as "Merrye Syndrome." This condition causes them to regress mentally and physically as they age. The family consists of three orphaned siblings—Ralph, Virginia, and Elizabeth—who live in a decaying mansion with their caretaker, Bruno, played by Lon Chaney Jr. The plot thickens when distant relatives arrive to claim the estate, leading to darkly comedic and horrific events as the siblings defend their home.

metadata.Plot: In a dilapidated rural mansion, the last generation of the degenerate, inbred Merrye family lives with the inherited curse of a disease that causes them to mentally regress from the age of 10 or so on as they physically develop. The family chauffeur looks out for them and covers up their indiscretions. Trouble comes when greedy distant relatives and their lawyer arrive to dispossess the family of its home.
metadata.Actors: Lon Chaney Jr., Carol Ohmart, Quinn K. Redeker
